channel.title: How to Make a 317 Compiler
channel.description:
Okay, today I'm going to show you how to make a 317 compiler.
Yes, I am aware that there are many tutorials out there but I'm doing this one for the sake of it.
First of all open NotePad.
Copy the code below and paste it in there.
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/CompilercodePicture.jpg[/img]
Now save the NotePad as [code]Compiler.bat[/code]
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/CompilerSaving.jpg[/img]
Go to your documents and drag the compiler out of your documents and drag it into your RuneScape Private Server Source folder.
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/CompilerinDocuments.jpg[/img]
Than run it and your done! (: .
[IMG]http://i1068.photobucket.com/albums/u442/ictbguud/Compilerinuse.jpg[/img]
Thanks so much for reading, comment!
Credits: 5% to me for typing.
95% to a guy on youtube.
(:!

item.title: How to Make a 317 Compiler
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“ictbguud, post:3, topic:443606”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=546284.msg4004808#msg4004808 date=1338502582]
Um, Why?

All servers come with compilers. Well about 99.99% do.
Plus, all you did was copy paste this. I can make a compiler any time.
What if the server is packaged?
You explained absolutely NOTHING.
You gave yourself more credits then you deserve.
This isn’t even considered a snippit.
/endrage
[/quote]

Ahem, no I did not copy and paste this and I made this for people who are making there OWN source and don’t have a working compiler, if you don’t like it maybe you need to take your rage and use it on yourself and see how it makes you feel.

I have seen over four-five server and sources that do NOT have a compiler.

I was just helping “Noobys” out…

My point here is done, goodbye.[/quote]

Kis, if someone knows how to code their own source, i think they might just know how to make a compiler?

Read full topic

95% to a guy on youtube.

(:![/quote]

You typed it out. In a general way, same thing.
again you explained NOTHING.
This is a snippit at MOST.
They belong in the snippit thread.
I’ve never seen a server w/o a compiler

item.title: How to Make a 317 Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

Okay, today I’m going to show you how to make a 317 compiler.

Yes, I am aware that there are many tutorials out there but I’m doing this one for the sake of it.

First of all open NotePad.

Copy the code below and paste it in there.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

CompilercodePicture.jpg809×261

Now save the NotePad as Compiler.bat

CompilerSaving.jpg823×314

Go to your documents and drag the compiler out of your documents and drag it into your RuneScape Private Server Source folder.

CompilerinDocuments.jpg1018×125

Than run it and your done! (: .

Compilerinuse.jpg786×399

Thanks so much for reading, comment!

Credits: 5% to me for typing.

95% to a guy on youtube.

(:!
